description:
Halloween is in town! While Haru is busy reading, Gatchmon heads out on his own. What`s with the picture that gets sent to Haru`s smartphone? What`s going on in the city?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Get You and Your Disguise Too! Cameramon`s Halloween Scandal!
Kasou no Kimi o Uitadakimasu! Cameramon no Halloween Scandal!
仮装のキミをうぃただきます! キャメラモンのハロウィンスキャンダル!
